summary: The module implements the full front‑end and back‑end pipeline for the Slang shader language, providing lexical analysis, parsing into an abstract syntax tree, AST node definitions, and a code generator that translates the Slang AST into CrossGL source code.
business_intent: Enable developers to write shaders in Slang and automatically convert them to CrossGL, facilitating cross‑platform graphics development and simplifying shader integration across different rendering APIs.
